#include <iostream>

#include <stdio.h>

#include <vector>

 

using namespace std;

 

bool isCarry( int a, int b ) {

 

	int c = 0, s;

 

	while( ( a > 0 ) && ( b > 0 ) ) {

 

		s = ( ( a % 10 ) + ( b % 10 ) + c );

		c = s / 10;

 

		if( c > 0 )

			return 1;

		a /= 10;

		b /= 10;

	}

 

	while( a > 0 ) {

 

		s = ( ( a % 10 ) + c );

		c = s / 10;

		if( c > 0 )

			return 1;

		a /= 10;

	}

 

	while( b > 0 ) {

 

		s = ( ( b % 10 ) + c );

		c = s / 10;

		if( c > 0 )

			return 1;

		b /= 10;

	}

 

	return 0;

}

int main() {

	
	int i, v, n, flag, t;

 

	scanf("%d", &t );

 

	while( t-- ) {

 

		scanf("%d", &n );

		
		if( n == 1 )

			printf("NO\n");

		else {

		
			flag = 0;

 

			for( i = 1;i <= n/2;i++ ) {

 

				v = n - i;

			//	cout << "i : " << i << " v : " << v << endl;

				if( !isCarry( i, v ) ) {

			//		cout <<"Enter\n";

					flag = 1;

					break;

				}

			}

 

			if( flag )

				printf("YES\n");

			else
				printf("NO\n");

			}

	}

 

	return 0;

}
